name: introductionScore
label: Description of needs and project goals
description: Quality of the introduction: Description and analysis of the current situation, review of challenges. Description and definition of the problem and the proposed solution.

name: introductionComments
label: Comments on the quality of the introduction

name: analysisScore
label: Analysis and solution formation
description: Analysis of the problem and description and the proposed solution. Use of quality sources.

name: analysisComments
label: Comments on the analysis of the problem

name: processScore
label: Research / Engineering Process
description: Challenges in research / development. Description of the process stages, constraints, and solutions.

name: processComments
label: Comments on the description of the work process

name: artifactsScore
label: Work Artifacts
description: Description of work products: algorithms, software system, user interface, testing plan.

name: organizationScore
label: Organization and clarity
description: Organization and clarity of the document, structure, logical flow, and diagrams.

name: organizationComments
label: Comments on the organization of the document

name: languageComments
label: Comments on the language (syntax, spelling, writing style, etc.)

name: generalEvaluationScore
label: General Evaluation
description: General impression, difficulty, and scope of the project.

name: researchProcessScore
label: Research / Engineering Process
description: Description of the research / engineering development process that was carried out, the various work stages, various constraints, description of the tests.

name: workAnalysisScore
label: Work analysis and conclusion
description: Analysis of the project progress, description of challenges and decisions. Summary, conclusions and insights.

name: workAnalysisComments
label: Comments on the analysis of the process

name: softwareQualityScore
label: Quality of the software/research
description: The quality of writing, documentation, and operation of a system and algorithms or the quality of research (the quality of answering an article question).

name: softwareQualityComments
label: Comments on the quality of writing

name: userGuidesScore
label: User and application guides
description: Quality of information in user manuals and maintenance files. Description of the software structure, flow and interfaces.

name: organizationScore
label: Organization and clarity
description: Organization of the document: structure, logical flow, linking components and clarity. Use of diagrams and accurate wording.

name: organizationComments
label: Comments on the organization of the document

name: generalEvaluationScore
label: General evaluation
description: General impression, difficulty, and scope of the project, with a unique approach.

name: organizationScore
label: Organization of the presentation
description: Understandable and clear order of presenting the topics, presenting the material clearly, adhering to the time frame.

name: systemPresentationScore
label: Quality of the presentation of the system
description: Description of the background, need and solution. Quality of the software demonstration.

name: projectReviewScore
label: Quality of the project review
description: Project summary, review of challenges, presentation of insights.

name: visibilityScore
label: Quality of the presentation visibility
description: Slides are easily read (size, color, and density), clarity of graphics presentation.

name: overallScore
label: Overall Score--------------------is this the general part?
description: Overall score for the project presentation

name: Knowledge
label: Level of knowledge and answering questions
description: Level of knowledge demonstrated and clarity in answering questions.

name: PresentationSkills
label: Presentation skills
description: Clarity, confidence, and delivery of the presentation.

label: Organization of the presentation
description: Understandable and clear order of presenting the topics, presenting the material clearly, adhering to the time frame.

name: systemPresentationScore
label: Solution presentation
description: Description of the background, need and solution. Quality of the software demonstration.

name: projectReviewScore
label: Quality of the project review
description: Project summary, review of challenges, presentation of insights.

label: Quality of the presentation visibility
description: Slides are easily read (size, color, and density), clarity of graphics presentation.

name: overallScore
label: Overall Score--------------------is this the general part?
description: Overall score for the project presentation.

name: Knowledge
label: Level of knowledge and answering questions
description: Level of knowledge demonstrated and clarity in answering questions.

name: PresentationSkills
label: Presentation skills
description: Clarity, confidence, and delivery of the presentation.

name: analysisAndSolution
label: Analysis and solution formation
description: Quality of the work process, use of original ideas, level of questions raised during the work.

name: projectDeliverables
label: Quality of the project deliverables
description: Quality of the book and project presentation: Description and analysis of the existing situation, review of challenges. Description of the problem and proposed solution, testing plan. Organization of information at a professional level - structure and order, proper focus and summaries, use of charts and graphics, headings and numbering.

name: generalEvaluation
label: General Evaluation
description: General impression, difficulty and scope of the project, use of a special approach.

name: overallScore
label: Overall Grade
description: Overall grade for the project.

name: IndependentLearning
label: Capability of independent learning
description: Ability to learn independently, degree of independent progress.

name: Teamwork
label: Teamwork
description: Collaboration, division of labor, dealing with difficulties.

name: Attitude
label: Overall attitude towards the project
description: Creative approach, willingness to invest, pace of progress, meeting the time frame.
